Articles.Content:
Hello all, I'm not an active member anymore but I did organize a KSP Dakar rally in 2017 which was a lot of fun for most of the forum members.

Obviously I'm not going to do a KSP Dakar 2018 challenge but I hate seeing this not happening.

So hereby I hope some one will take over the task of organizing the event.

Cheers.

Oh.

My.

God.......

Iiiiiiittttttssssss BAAAAAAAAACCCCKKKKK!!!!!!!!!

*Rock music plays*

So we going on the same rules (No quick saves, no flying, etc.) and the same track? I must know! XD

Glad you're back, man

Wait, didn’t he say that he wasn’t doing it? 

I saw the old version, I was always meaning to participate but never got round to it. Maybe I can actually try it if somebody reruns it.

Edited December 3, 2017 by MiffedStarfish
I volunteer! Same course, Same rules, same everything...  This is gonna be fuuuuuun!!!
